Modeling a binary network outcome

Peter Hoff

2018-07-27

Source: vignettes/binary_demo.Rmd
binary_demo.Rmd

Load the library:

library(amen)

Set up the data:

data(lazegalaw)

Y<-lazegalaw$Y[,,2]
Xn<-lazegalaw$X[,c(2,4,5,6)]
Xd<-lazegalaw$Y[,,-2]
Xd<-array( c(Xd,outer(Xn[,4],Xn[,4],"==")),dim=dim(Xd)+c(0,0,1))
dimnames(Xd)[[3]]<-c("advice","cowork","samepractice")

dimnames(Xd)[[3]]
## [1] "advice"       "cowork"       "samepractice"
dimnames(Xn)[[2]]
## [1] "female"    "seniority" "age"       "practice"

plot the network with “practice” denoted by plotting color:

netplot(lazegalaw$Y[,,2],ncol=Xn[,4])

fitSRRM<-ame(Y, Xd=Xd, Xr=Xn, Xc=Xn, family="bin")

summary(fitSRRM) 
## 
## Regression coefficients:
##                    pmean   psd z-stat p-val
## intercept         -0.293 0.469 -0.624 0.532
## female.row        -0.035 0.128 -0.271 0.786
## seniority.row     -0.002 0.009 -0.239 0.811
## age.row           -0.015 0.009 -1.775 0.076
## practice.row      -0.137 0.108 -1.274 0.202
## female.col        -0.045 0.128 -0.348 0.728
## seniority.col      0.017 0.009  1.960 0.050
## age.col           -0.008 0.008 -0.988 0.323
## practice.col      -0.189 0.096 -1.973 0.049
## advice.dyad       -0.099 0.081 -1.227 0.220
## cowork.dyad        1.146 0.062 18.358 0.000
## samepractice.dyad  0.452 0.056  8.085 0.000
## 
## Variance parameters:
##     pmean   psd
## va  0.159 0.035
## cab 0.015 0.023
## vb  0.126 0.028
## rho 0.076 0.050
## ve  1.000 0.000
fitAME<-ame(Y, Xd=Xd, Xr=Xn, Xc=Xn, R=3, family="bin")

summary(fitAME) 
## 
## Regression coefficients:
##                    pmean   psd z-stat p-val
## intercept         -0.733 0.708 -1.034 0.301
## female.row        -0.101 0.200 -0.505 0.614
## seniority.row      0.000 0.016  0.024 0.981
## age.row           -0.025 0.014 -1.837 0.066
## practice.row      -0.074 0.170 -0.435 0.664
## female.col        -0.119 0.178 -0.669 0.504
## seniority.col      0.009 0.013  0.697 0.486
## age.col           -0.006 0.011 -0.573 0.567
## practice.col      -0.106 0.144 -0.737 0.461
## advice.dyad       -0.130 0.106 -1.223 0.221
